class.name: AudioEffectEQ
class.brief_description: Base class for audio equalizers. Choose among [AudioEffectEQ6], [AudioEffectEQ10], [AudioEffectEQ21] or [AudioEffectEQCustom] according to specific needs.
class.description: An equalizer gives you control over different parts of the audio according to frequencies. It boosts or suppresses certain frequencies (bands) according to the setup. Equalizers can compensate for existing deficiencies in audio as well as create different effects on a sound. An equalizer may be applied on the Master bus to master a mix as a whole and give it more character. They are also useful when a game is run on a mobile device, to adjust the mix to that kind of speakers (for example, an equalizer can be added but disabled when headphones are plugged). [AudioEffectEQ] is the base class and need not be directly used. See [AudioEffectEQ6], [AudioEffectEQ10], [AudioEffectEQ21] and [AudioEffectEQCustom] for different setups.

method.name: get_band_count
method.description: Returns the number of bands of the equalizer.

method.name: get_band_frequency
method.description: Returns the band's center frequency at the specified index in hertz.

method.name: get_band_gain_db
method.description: Returns the band's gain at the specified index, in dB.

method.name: set_band_gain_db
method.description: Sets band's gain at the specified index, in dB.
